files.description: Implements a JSONL annotation validator that checks each record against the taxonomy/schema rules and returns per-record errors plus a pass/fail summary.

Summary: Implemented a compact JSONL annotation validator exporting validateAnnotationsJsonl with per-record errors and pass/fail summary.

FILE_WRITTEN:src/taxonomy/validate_annotations.js
DIR_STATE:["src/taxonomy/cli_validate.py", "src/taxonomy/io.py", "src/taxonomy/schema.py", "src/taxonomy/validate_annotations.js", "src/taxonomy/validator.py"]
Summary: Wrote a complete JSONL annotation validator module that parses records and returns per-record errors plus an overall pass/fail summary.

files.description: CLI runner that loads the JSONL fixture, invokes the validator, and writes the summary and per-record errors to runtime/_build/reports/taxonomy_validation.json with a nonzero exit code on failure.
